alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cross Creek, or near Citra, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross Creek and McIntosh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall has occurred with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
